name: Cranberry Crush
description: Amaro adds rich, complex flavor and sweetness to this tangy cranberry cocktail. Be sure to use a less-sweet tonic water, like Q Tonic, for the best balance.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: 3 whole cranberries and lime twist

recipeInstructions.text: For the cranberry syrup: combine sugar, water, cranberries, and cinnamon stick in a small saucepan over medium heat, stirring frequently. Cook until sugar dissolves and cranberries soften and pop. Mash cranberries slightly. Let cool. Strain with a fine-mesh strainer and keep sealed in the refrigerator.

For the cocktail: Muddle cranberries, ginger, and cranberry syrup in the bottom of a cocktail shaker until cranberries have popped. Fill shaker with ice. Add bitters, gin, amaro, and lime. Shake well until chilled. Double strain into cocktail glass, top with splash of tonic, whole cranberries, and lime twist.
